name: Country Inn & Suites By Carlson Sahibabad

reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel a couple of times..The hotel is conveniently located if you are visiting Ghaziabad or Noida for work. The rooms are very good for the price you pay for them. Spacious, with a good décor and well maintained bathroom.…The only shortcoming I found about this hotel during both the visits is the tardy service. The check-in and checkout takes a long time. The restaurant staff is confused if there are more guests during the breakfast time. They are also not proficient in English.. The restaurant is purely vegetarian, but it is not mentioned anywhere on their website. I would still recommend this hotel if you are OK with veg food as the other similar grade hotels around this place are very highly priced.
reviews.title: Good rooms…not so good service

reviews.text: We had a very nice wedding party organized at Country Inn & Suites, ghaziabad. It was very well arranged and the food quality was up to the mark. The only problem is that the DJ time was very limited and we could not extend it for long. But otherwise everything was very nice.
reviews.title: Simply Ammazing

reviews.text: Ideal stay if u r in Delhi and you are looking for a 5 star experience. I was a vegetarian so nothing can beat this hotel. The Sauna service is good, Health club is available with personal trainer so good if you are thinking of staying for long. Rooms were good staff was always polite. before i visited this place i never new vegetarian food has this much of verity. Should stay
reviews.title: Great space and service and to add it Veg

reviews.text: I stayed here for a day but it was good experience. Liked the hotel but it is far away from main Delhi. Food was nice, I liked the pizza and soup served. Room service was good. Ambience is good. Hotel is very neat and clean.
reviews.title: Short but good experience

reviews.text: It was my first time and experience to stay in the Vegetarian Hotel like this Hotel. As the 5 star hotel, I found the facilities were amazing, clean and nice room, huge Lobby and specially the experience to taste vegetarian food. it was amazing for me and family as we never know that all the kind of meat they have provide in the menu was vegie. I also like to taste the pure sugarcane in the breakfast time.
reviews.title: another experience at 5 star vegetarian hotel

reviews.text: the hotel is awesome with the best of facilities and have the best of varieties of vegetarian and JAIN food. it is worth the money paid. staff is excellent. overall 10/10. only drawback is that it is away from Delhi (central)
reviews.title: BEST part Pure vegetarian food !!!

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for a couple of nights last month while on a business trip. Really liked the concept of a 100% veg 5 star hotel. Room was really done up nicely, and clean as well. Food was good as well, breakfast spread was great. Really liked the dosa and parathas. Their pastries and cakes at the lobby were good too..
reviews.title: Good hotel; in a bad location

reviews.text: Bad part - They delayed the taxi most of the times, despite asking in advance. Also the billing department goofed up our bill by adding a few food bills (for about Rs. 5000, obviously not ours) to our room. The food receipts obviously had someone else's signature on them, but they apparently don't cross check before adding to a room. After pointing out the mistake, they took about 30 mins to rectify it and we almost missed our flight because of that!
reviews.title: nice hotel for family and business stay

reviews.text: The main dampener is the surroundings. As soon as we stepped out of the door, there was a constant stinking smell like H2S, probably because of the factories surrounding it. The whole place is also quite dirty, like elsewhere in the Ghaziabad area. Also the location is quite far from Noida and the traffic can be frustrating.
reviews.title: First Class Hotel, Really Fantastic by any standards

reviews.text: loved my stay there as in room interior, hotel amenties, food but somehow the floor was noisy maintaining the culture of Uttar pradesh but just if i leave this aside the property is aswesome though its a pure veg hotel but still what is has is at its best.
reviews.title: Country inn Sahibabad only 5Star hotel serving 100% vegetable meals

reviews.text: It has been a great experience to stay at Country Inn, Ghaziabad. The best part of the hotel is nice & spacious rooms and the spread offered for breakfast & dinner. You will find all the vegetarian delicacies in the spread. However, non-vegetarians beaware, the hotel does not offer any non-veg food. The hotel has a nice pool & parking facilities as well. The only disadvantage is the distance of the hotel from the airport. It will take almost 1.5 hours to reach the hotel from the airport even during late evenings. The hotel is owned by the carlson group. You can also visit the Shipra mall which is very close to the hotel.
reviews.title: Best Vegeterian 5 star hotel

reviews.text: We have stayed in Country Inn many a times. The experience was awesome. The food, service and rooms are excellent. The room are spacious and interiors were classy. The suite was real King sized.Even the beauty service offered is one of the best. You ask for best room rates.
reviews.title: Awesome Awesome

reviews.text: One of the best Hotels to stay in Ghaziabad.
reviews.title: Good vegetarian Hotel

reviews.text: Country Inn & Suites Ghaziabad is a great vegetarian hotel. Me being a pure non-veg,enjoyed the stay at Country Inn & Suites. The rooms are cozy with good gym, sauna and swimming pool. The vegetarian cusine is really good
reviews.title: New building, decent service standards

reviews.text: The room are spacious and interiors are well appointed. What caught my attention was restaurant in the basement(I forgot the name) that served only vegetarian food. I was surprised but the food did not give me an opportunity to complain. Everyone loved the spread that was on offer. I will try it again whenever possible.
reviews.title: Worst place to stay and dine.

reviews.text: I stayed there many times, as my business is close by.
reviews.title: average

reviews.text: The room is good for the price. large and comfortable bed.
reviews.title: Country Inn review

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Small negative points are
reviews.title: One of the best hotel in NCR region

reviews.text: -internet is very slow. Takes so long to connect.I always spent for a long time.
reviews.title: Do not get a room over pool or car park

reviews.text: -food(especially breakfast) is not nice. and they only serve veg food.
reviews.title: Tatva Restaurant at country inn & suites Sahibabad

description: The Country Inn & Suites By Carlson Sahibabad, Distt Ghaziabad (U.P) hotel's location in the East Delhi National Capital Region (NCR) is conveniently close to the Vaishali Metro Station and Akshardham Temple. This luxurious hotel boasts numerous on-site restaurants in addition to a complimentary, hot breakfast buffet. Pamper yourself during your stay with a health club and spa, a beauty salon and a shopping arcade. You can relax in the indoor pool and enjoy a drink at the poolside bar. This hotel's site in Ghaziabad is eco-friendly, 100% vegetarian and guarantees a five-star experience for your stay in the area. Book a spacious room or a luxurious suite with upgraded amenities to begin your rejuvenating stay in Sahibabad.
